dct_title_s: Bartholomew's "Half-inch to mile" map of England & Wales
dct_alternative_sm: Bartholomew's new reduced survey for tourists and cyclists Sheet 3 Cumberland
dct_description_sm: Copyright - John Bartholomew F.R.G.S. ; reduced by permission from the Ordnance Survey, with special local revision to date of publication ; roads revised by the Cyclist's Touring Club ; The Edinburgh Geographical Institute.
Relief shown by gradient tints, form lines, spot heights.
Includes index maps to various sets.
Shows woods, various roads and paths, railways (with stations, crossings, etc.), waterways, canals, low water areas, county boundaries.
Sticker on cover: "A. W. Johnson & Sons, Windermere & Bowness."

Dated from back-cover text: "The great War now raging in Europe, and by its colossal dimensions making itself felt throughout the whole civilized world, must bring home more forcibly than ever the absolute necessity..."
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
